column2: Alpha Black to PapaBear, incoming russians. We are now engaged, where is that support. Over.
Alpha to PapaBear, seems like all russians are either dead or fleeing. Send in the extract. Over.
Alpha to PapaBear, we are back at the base. Alpha out.
PapaBear to Alpha, we copy, support should be there momentarily. Hang tight. Over.
PapaBear to Alpha, understood. Extract helo onway. PapaBear out.
PapaBear to Alpha. Roger that, welcome back. Mission Accomplished. Out.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
